verses.name: Luke 17:30
verses.text: Even thus shall it be in the day when the Son of man is revealed.

verses.name: Luke 17:31
verses.text: In that day, he which shall be upon the housetop, and his stuff in the house, let him not come down to take it away: and he that is in the field, let him likewise not return back.

verses.name: Luke 17:33
verses.text: Whosoever shall seek to save his life shall lose it; and whosoever shall lose his life shall preserve it.

verses.name: Luke 17:34
verses.text: I tell you, in that night there shall be two men in one bed; the one shall be taken, and the other shall be left.
